---
id: stop-cloud-transcode
title: "StopCloudTranscode"
description: "Call this API to stop single stream transcoding tasks."
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/en/server/api-reference/stream-mixing/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>StopCloudTranscode</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to stop single stream transcoding tasks.

"Client" single stream transcoding introduction triggered by transcoding template, please refer to [Single Stream Transcoding](/real-time-video-android-java/live-streaming/single-stream-transcoding)ï¼›
"Server" related callbacks, please refer to [Single Stream Transcoding Start Callback](/real-time-video-server/callback/transcoding/on-demand-transcoding-started) and [Single Stream Transcoding Stop Callback](/real-time-video-server/callback/transcoding/on-demand-transcoding-stopped).

 <Note title="Call frequency limit">100 times/second</Note>

## Request
